sentences.en: Bulky items will be collected separately.
Chris had insisted that we went separately to the club.
sentences.cn: 克里斯坚持我们不要一块儿去俱乐部。

sentences.en: Cook each vegetable separately until just tender.
sentences.cn: 每样蔬菜都单独烹调，煮到稍稍变软就好。

sentences.en: Free gifts are dispatched separately so please allow 28 days for delivery.
sentences.cn: 赠品会分开发送，所以请预留28天的送货期。

sentences.en: He bought the parts separately and assembled his own computer.
sentences.cn: 他一一买来部件,组装成自己的电脑.

sentences.en: He sold his birds separately to separate buyers.
sentences.cn: 他把他的鸟儿分别卖给不同的买主.

sentences.en: Husband and wife are now taxed separately on their incomes.
sentences.cn: 现在夫妻双方分别按各自的收入纳税。

sentences.en: It doesn't matter much whether we go together or separately.
sentences.cn: 我们一起去还是分头去都可以.

sentences.en: Let's go about the work separately.
Living separately from parents after marriage is all the mode.
sentences.cn: 现在非常流行婚后与父母分开住.

sentences.en: None of us can afford It'separately, so let's pool our resources.
sentences.cn: 我们之中谁也不能单独买得起这东西, 所以我们就集资购买吧.

sentences.en: The full text will be dispatched separately.
The issues should be treated separately.
sentences.cn: 这些问题应该分别对待。

sentences.en: They were photographed separately and then as a group.
sentences.cn: 他们先单独照相，然后合影。

sentences.en: Wash the white clothes together, and the blue one separately.
sentences.cn: 那些白衣服放在一起洗, 这件蓝的要单洗.

words.tran_cn: 分开的；分居；不在一起生活的
分离性的；倾向分离的；区别性的
分离，分开；间隔，距离；[法] 分居；缺口
分开；隔开（separate的过去式和过去分词）

trans.tran_cn: 分别地，另行，分开，单独，分离地，个别地
trans.tran_en: If people or things are dealt with separately or do something separately, they are dealt with or do something at different times or places, rather than together
